import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete asset"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently removes an asset record from the system. This is a destructive operation and cannot be undone. The asset will be marked as deleted and will no longer appear in standard asset queries.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Locate the device via [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) or [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id) and capture `Items[].AssetId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the asset: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to capture `Items[].AssetId`.
2. Verify the asset details: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id) to confirm this is the correct record.
3. Delete the asset: [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/delete-asset).

**Note**: To restore a deleted asset, use [PUT /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/undelete](/docs/api/assets/undelete-asset).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to delete. Obtain from [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) (`Items[].AssetId`) or [GET /api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id).","example":"11111111-1111-4111-8111-111111111111","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchAssets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets","responseField":"Items[].AssetId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
